Aluworks bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nke dị na Tema, Greater Accra
E hiwere ya na Febụwarị 24, 1978 ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụgwọ ọha na eze na Mee 28, 1996
Mgbe e nyere ya onyinye ọha na eze n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1996, edepụtara ya na Ghana Stock Exchange na Nọvemba 29, 1996 na ọnụahịa nke GH¢ 0.135. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ndepụta nke GSE All-Share Index.

ha 
Aluworks bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eme mpempe aluminum, coils, corrugated roofing, louver blades, wdg
Otu n'ime ndị na-ere ihe ndị bụ isi nke Aluworks, Volta Aluminum Company, mechiri kpamkpam n'etiti Mee 2003 na mmalite 2006 n'ihi nsogbu na mkparịta ụka ọkụ eletrik.
